quilt

Class MinRemnant

  • java.lang.Object
    • quilt.Remnant
      • quilt.MinRemnant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColoredRemnant, EmptyRemnant, FilledRemnant

    public abstract class MinRemnant
extends Remnant
    MinRemnant

    Minimal Remnant used by a Quilt.

    Source code is available.
